attributes.action: Free petrol allowance for Home Care Workers
attributes.additional_details:
Dear Government,
we the undersigned wish you the government look at ways to make life the Home Care Workers easier when it comes to the cost of petrol, some of us are already working for minimum wage but by the time we pay out £25 or more a week in fuel, we are in respect working for less than NMW.  How can this happen in this day and age.  Please act now before a lot more people give up their jobs and become one of the unemployed statistics.
